data.comment: The match is underway in Portland.
Guido Gonzales Jr awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 1, Free kick Portland.
Portland's Diego Valeri is on target but unsuccessful.
San Jose awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 5, San Jose pushes forward through Cristian Espinoza, whose finish on goal is saved.
San Jose have been awarded a corner by Guido Gonzales Jr.
Oswaldo Alanis (San Jose) strikes at Providence Park but his header is cleared.
In the minute 8, Guido Gonzales Jr signals a free kick to Portland.
San Jose are caught offside.
Free kick for Portland in the half of San Jose.
In the minute 11, Diego Valeri gets his shot on target but fails to score for Portland.
Throw-in for San Jose at Providence Park.
Can Portland get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in San Jose's half?
In the minute 14, San Jose drives forward and Judson gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Free kick for San Jose in their own half.
In Portland a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 18, Portland will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from San Jose.
Eryk Williamson (Portland) gets a yellow card.
Portland needs to be cautious. San Jose have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 20, Throw-in for Portland in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Portland in the half of San Jose.
In the minute 22, Bill Tuiloma (Portland) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Guido Gonzales Jr awards San Jose a goal kick.
In Portland, Chris Wondolowski (San Jose) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
In the minute 23, Portland awarded a free kick in their own half.
San Jose to take a throw-in in Portland territory.
Throw-in Portland.
In the minute 25, Portland have a dangerous throw-in.
Portland are pushing forward but Marco Farfan's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Portland.
In the minute 27, Guido Gonzales Jr signals a free kick to San Jose in their own half.
Portland awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for San Jose in their own half.
In the minute 29, Marco Farfan (Portland) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Guido Gonzales Jr signals a free kick to Portland in their own half.
Corner awarded to Portland.
In the minute 32, Ball goes out of play for a San Jose goal kick.
San Jose are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Ball safe as San Jose is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 35, Portland have a goal kick.
Carlos Fierro is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Guido Gonzales Jr signals a free kick to San Jose in their own half.
In the minute 39, Carlos Fierro is back on the pitch.
San Jose drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
San Jose have been awarded a corner by Guido Gonzales Jr.
In the minute 42, Throw-in Portland.
Guido Gonzales Jr signals a throw-in for Portland, close to San Jose's area.
Throw-in for Portland in the half of San Jose.
In the minute 44, Marvin Loria of Portland smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to San Jose.
Free kick for Portland in their own half.
In the minute 45, Guido Gonzales Jr will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Can San Jose capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Portland's half?
Corner awarded to San Jose.
In the minute 45, San Jose's Jackson Yueill gets in a shot on goal at Providence Park. But the effort is unsuccessful.
The first-half is over.
The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 46, Portland move into a 1-0 lead through a Jaroslaw Niezgoda header.
Diego Chara instrumental with a fine assist.
San Jose awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 50, San Jose awarded a free kick in their own half.
Great finish from Jaroslaw Niezgoda to give Portland a 2-0 lead.
Portland are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 55, Throw-in high up the field for San Jose in Portland.
Guido Gonzales Jr awards the away team a throw-in.
Guido Gonzales Jr signals a free kick to San Jose in their own half.
In the minute 57, Throw-in for San Jose close to the penalty box.
Ball safe as Portland is awarded a throw-in in their half.
San Jose awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 60, Free kick for Portland in their own half.
The home team replace Jaroslaw Niezgoda with Felipe Mora.
Jeremy Ebobisse is replacing Yimmi Chara for the home team.
In the minute 62, Guido Gonzales Jr signals a Portland throw-in in San Jose's half.
Guido Gonzales Jr signals a free kick to Portland in their own half.
Goal kick for San Jose at Providence Park.
Throw-in for San Jose at Providence Park.
In the minute 65, Matias Jesus Almeyda is making the team's first substitution at Providence Park with Shea Salinas replacing Tommy Thompson.
Portland drive upfield and Felipe Mora gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a San Jose defender.
In the minute 67, Throw-in for San Jose in their own half.
San Jose's Carlos Fierro misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Portland goal kick.
In the minute 69, In Portland a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Tanner Beason (San Jose) has received a yellow card from Guido Gonzales Jr.
San Jose pushes forward through Cristian Espinoza, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 71, San Jose have been awarded a corner by Guido Gonzales Jr.
San Jose are whistled for offside.
Guido Gonzales Jr signals a free kick to Portland.
Throw-in for San Jose in their own half.
In the minute 74, Giovanni Savarese (Portland) is making a third substitution, with Tomas Conechny replacing Diego Valeri.
Throw-in for Portland in the half of San Jose.
In the minute 75, Throw-in for San Jose at Providence Park.
San Jose's Jackson Yueill breaks free at Providence Park. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Portland at Providence Park.
In the minute 78, San Jose to take a throw-in in Portland territory.
Corner awarded to San Jose.
Free kick for Portland in their own half.
In the minute 80, At Providence Park, Andy Rios has been yellow-carded for the away team.
San Jose have been awarded a corner by Guido Gonzales Jr.
Shea Salinas's header is off-target for San Jose.
In the minute 81, Guido Gonzales Jr awards Portland a goal kick.
Throw-in San Jose.
Portland have been awarded a corner by Guido Gonzales Jr.
In the minute 83, Bill Tuiloma (Portland) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Portland.
Bill Tuiloma (Portland) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
In the minute 84, Throw-in for Portland close to the penalty box.
Guido Gonzales Jr awards the home team a throw-in.
Goal! Felipe Mora extends Portland lead to 3-0 with a header.
In the minute 86, Great play from Diego Chara to set up the goal.
Portland's Jeremy Ebobisse gets his shot away but it misses the target.
San Jose have a goal kick.
In the minute 88, Free kick Portland.
The home team have replaced Marvin Loria with Renzo Zambrano. This is the fourth substitution made today by Giovanni Savarese.
Portland awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Portland a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Portland in the half of San Jose.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
Can Portland get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in San Jose's half?
San Jose awarded a throw-in in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Portland.
Full-time! The final score is 3-0.
